content.prompt: Conservative Republican opponents of the Treaty of Versailles argued that the League of Nations would

choices.label: isolate the United States from postwar world affairs
prevent the United States from seeking reparations from Germany
give England and France a greater role than the United States in maintaining world peace

topic.text: 7.5: World War I - Military and Diplomacy

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
